content:
This one-day conference on August 11 might be interesting to more than a few people here. More details will come later!

This is the first announcement for:

OPERAD POP-UP

What: 24-Hour conference on operads, their applications, and related topics
When: 11 August, 2020. 00:00 UTC - 23:59 UTC.
Where: zoom (details forthcoming) and twitch.tv/operads
More information: http://phck.net/operad/

Confirmed speakers:
Luciana Basualdo Bonatto (University of Oxford)
Nathaniel Bottman (University of Southern California)
Anna Cepek (IBS Center for Geometry and Physics)
Michael Ching (Amherst College)
Joost Nuiten (Montpellier)
Dan Petersen (Stockholm university)
Sophie Raynor (Macquarie University)
María Ronco (Universidad de Talca)
Dmitry Vaintrob (UC Berkeley)

More details, including schedules, abstracts, and format will appear soon at the website http://phck.net/operad/ . If you have any questions, please contact one of the organizers: Philip Hackney, Geoffroy Horel, Marcy Robertson. We hope to see you there!

Here's a second announcement about the conference happening on August 11. We've rounded out the speaker list (@Richard Garner Syunji Moriya, and Bruno Vallette were all added), and registration is now open. Hope to see many of you there!

OPERAD POP-UP

What: 24-Hour conference on operads, their applications, and related topics
When: 11 August, 2020 (Tuesday). 00:00 UTC - 23:59 UTC.
Where: Zoom (register for details) and twitch.tv/operads
More information / registration: https://operads.com

Speakers:
Luciana Basualdo Bonatto (University of Oxford)
Nathaniel Bottman (University of Southern California)
Anna Cepek (IBS Center for Geometry and Physics)
Michael Ching (Amherst College)
Richard Garner (Macquarie University)
Syunji Moriya (Osaka Prefecture University)
Joost Nuiten (Université de Montpellier)
Dan Petersen (Stockholm university)
Sophie Raynor (Macquarie University)
María Ronco (Universidad de Talca)
Dmitry Vaintrob (University of California, Berkeley)
Bruno Vallette (Université Sorbonne Paris Nord)

Organizers:
Philip Hackney
Geoffroy Horel
Marcy Robertson

Sponsor:
Mathematical Research Institute MATRIX
https://www.matrix-inst.org.au
